title: Montante's World
description:
Mike Montante of Montante's World joins the show in-studio (00:00:10). A remarkable performance over the weekend by friend of the show, Fred Couples (00:03:00). Bob Kraft got married over the weekend and Kirk wonders why lousy players weren't invited (00:08:00). Stephen A. makes Tom Brady yelling at his offensive line about race (00:18:00). Steve Robinson of The Maine Wire is breaking news (00:28:00). Ryan Whitney is socializing with Tom Werner and Sam Kennedy (00:33:00). Rich Shertenlieb is paying the salary and a 38% mark up for one of his producers who was laid off recently (00:45:00).


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
